articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: New Orleans Rebounds After Attack and Biden's Environmental Agenda Takes Shape
articles.description: The article covers US domestic news, highlighting New Orleans' resilience after a deadly vehicle attack. It discusses Biden's planned ban on offshore drilling, the legacy of alcohol warnings under Trump, award ceremonies by Biden, and political tensions concerning Trump's legal troubles and Republicans' internal conflicts.
articles.content: In the wake of a tragic vehicle attack that shocked New Orleans on New Year's Day, the city is regaining its rhythm, as locals and tourists once again fill its vibrant streets. Despite barriers that may not withstand high-speed impacts, Mayor LaToya ... [1091 chars]

articles.author: Yahoo Finance
articles.title: Billionaire Investor Bill Ackman Thinks 2 Stocks Could Soar Roughly 900% Under the Incoming Trump Administration
articles.description: President-elect Donald Trump has made many investors bullish on the market, which has been on an incredible two-year run. Not surprisingly, billionaire investor Bill Ackman, a vocal Trump supporter, is all aboard this train. Ackman and his fund Pershing Square Holdings have delivered extraordinary gains over the last five years.

articles.title: Donald Trump Calls for Judge Juan Merchan to Be Disbarred
articles.description: The president-elect laid out his thoughts on Merchan and the requirement to show up for sentencing on January 10 in his criminal hush money case.
articles.content:
Donald Trump has called for the disbarment of Judge Juan Merchan, who presided over his criminal hush money case last year, in a Truth Social message posted on Saturday after the judge set a date for the president-elect's sentencing for January 10.

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Diplomatic Challenges: Italian PM Meloni's High-Stakes US Visit
articles.description: Italian PM Giorgia Meloni plans a trip to Florida to meet President-elect Trump, amid diplomatic tensions, after Italian journalist Cecilia Sala was arrested in Iran. This follows an Iranian businessman's detention in Italy on a U.S. warrant. Italy is urged to reject US 'hostage policy'.
